title: Lipo alternate for linux
content:
Currently, I'm using lipo tool to extract the arch type from a fat iOS binary on a Mac OS. Now, I want to do the same on the linux platform for the iOS binaries, i.e. extract a given arch type from a fat iOS binary on a linux platform. However, lipo support is not available on Linux.
Any suggestions how can I achieve the same? Any alternate of lipo for linux which does the same?

answers_data.content:
Here’s a port of Apple’s 
cctools
to Linux, it should include 
lipo
: https://github.com/tpoechtrager/cctools-port
